name: Unitled Underwater Tower Defense Project
description:
CONTROLS

  • hold Shift to carry tower letting it  will release it
  • wasd movement
  • mouse-click while carrying to throw tower at pointer's position
  • Space to open and close upgrade menu
  • Escape to pause
